sentence:
Ms. PETTERSEN. Mr. Speaker, I rise today to recognize Miya Atencio  for earning the Arvada Wheat Ridge Service Ambassadors for Youth Award.

Miya has overcome many challenges along her journey to success,  demonstrating perseverance at every step. Students who strive to make…
